meanings.definition: Any of the Arabic numerals 0 to 9.
meanings.sent1: I can count on my fingers and toes, which are my digits.
meanings.sent2: She quickly typed the phone number using the digits on the keypad.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf painted tiny faces on all the digits of the clock.
meanings.sent4: In the digital age, our lives are ruled by the tiny digits on screens.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked the students to identify the odd digits in the sequence.

meanings.sent1: He accidentally slammed the door on his digits, causing pain.
meanings.sent2: The baby held onto her mother's digits as they walked in the park.
meanings.sent3: The cat playfully batted at the dangling digits of yarn.
meanings.sent4: The dancer moved gracefully, extending her digits with elegance.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's strong digits gripped the bar tightly during the competition.
